column5: Virtual fishing to get reel in Japan  I wonder if they'll start coming out with different rods/combos
You beat me to it! Was just going to post myself.  It'd be pretty funny sitting on a park bench and making people think you were throwing something at them when all you were doing was fishing!

WOW he just invented that?????  i think i will go down to the locker room and pull out all the ones i have had for 15 years...............  ya cast it out, it goes splash, and you reel in. when a fish hits, the fight is on. im sure many of the members here have a few of them .
Do you think P3TA will be offering a cash rebate on these. It's perfect for those that are strict C&R anglers.
Hahaa, I hope they will actually make you skunk once in a while so it actually feels real.  I'd be interested in the missed hooksets and snags too!
